text: @realDonaldTrump @seanhannity 500,000 plus confirmed deaths from coronavirus worldwide but you just want to make it about you🙄1/4 of these deaths are in the US due to your criminal behavior. Yes, the whole world is suffering, just to get at you muthafocker
